I've owned this game for some time now both on Steam and for an Xbox. I've run through the campaign and co-op more times than I can remember, watched videos of it, and I still come back to it from time to time. Granted, this game is not perfect, but at this point it has one of those nostalgic good-times feelings that you look over its imperfections for the sake of enjoying something again. I think that's largely in part because of the character Cave Johnson. 

I think overall this game took the base idea from the first and added on to it in a way that was done well. They tweaked the movement and made it more fast paced. Character development isn't inherently lacking, and it looks a lot better. 
If you're looking at the reviews before you buy the game, then all I can offer is this: Portal 2 is a game with a story, the focus is around puzzles, and you should be prepared to die. But at least you can listen to the golden voice of some bygone-era character while you sink in acid.

Fantástico, não é melhor descrição do que fantástico.
Revolucionou a industria dos games e continua sendo referencia em história e jogabilidade.
Volta e outra sempre volto a jogá-lo para relembrar da sensação fantástica que é jogar essa obra prima.
Esse jogo é realmente uma revolução no mercado dos games, não é apenas um jogo estrategico mas com uma baita historia de fundo.

Ein Pflicht-Programm für Fans des Vorgängers - und generell so ziemlich jeden Spieler, der eine schlaue, spaßige und originelle Herausforderung sucht. Wenn man Schritt für Schritt einen Level enträtselt, knistert der Spielspaß konstant, bis hin zum erheblichen Wohlgefühl bei der letztendlichen Meisterung. Die Gels sind der Hit, die anderen neuen Puzzle-Elemente bereichern ebenfalls das Portal-Spielprinzip. Auch wenn ich mitunter kräftig gegrübelt und auch mal geflucht habe - das Level-Design ist fair und die Motivation bis zum Finale hoch.
One of most favorite games :)  never get old

This is definitely a nice game. The story is well written, with a huge twist in the middle of the game (spoiler alert). 

The puzzles are created perfectly. They are tough enough to make you think, but not too tough that you need to search youtube for walkthroughs. Generally, it makes you feel smart. 

I don't think I can find another game that beats this game, unless Portal 3 came out. Oh wait, should be Portal 2: Episode 1 and 2..

A sequência (que consegue ser ainda melhor) de um jogo extremamente inovador, com um visual simples porém único. 

Nele, você conhece Wheatley, que é, sem dúvida, um exemplo fantástico de Alívio Cômico, com uma personalidade engraçada. 

Além disso, os Puzzles que cada vez ficam mais difíceis e desafiadores, que quando você os consegue resolver, se pergunta "Como eu não pensei nisso antes ?!". 

Sem dúvida uma compra que valerá muito a pena e te trará horas de entretenimento, não só com o Modo História, mas com o Multiplayer, onde podem ser jogados mapas criados pela Comunidade.
Is there anyone that who does not know this game?
